headline: Trump trade adviser Navarro says administration may force data center builders like Meta to 'internalize' costs
summary: Data centers powering artificial intelligence have strained the electrical grid and driven utility costs higher for consumers.

raw.headline: Trump trade adviser Navarro says administration may force data center builders like Meta to 'internalize' costs
raw.summary: Data centers powering artificial intelligence have strained the electrical grid and driven utility costs higher for consumers.

headline: Why American Electric Power (AEP) Is Up 7.6% After Beating Earnings And Unveiling $72 Billion Plan
summary: In 2025, American Electric Power Company, Inc. reported higher sales of US$21.35 billion and revenue of US$21.88 billion, with net income rising to US$3.58 billion and diluted earnings per share from continuing operations increasing to US$6.66, while also beating fourth‑quarter earnings and revenue expectations. Alongside reaffirming its 2026 operating earnings outlook, AEP outlined a US$72 billion multi‑year capital plan and doubled its contracted large‑load pipeline to 56 GW, underscoring...
